title: Did the Kochs Contribute $500,000 to Paul Ryan After the GOP Tax Plan Was Passed?
subtitle: Charles and Elizabeth Koch gave nearly half a million dollars to the House Speaker's fundraising committee after passage of the Republican tax bill.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Charles and Elizabeth Koch contributed nearly $500,000 to Paul Ryan’s fundraising committee after the GOP tax plan passed in the U.S. House of Representatives.
